section.title: System Requirements
section.para: JBoss Developer Studio 5.0.2 is supported on the following operating systems:

row.entry: Microsoft Windows XP, Window 7 and Windows 8
Mac OS X 10.7 and Mac OS X 10.8

section.para: JBoss Developer Studio 5 requires a Java developer kit of version 1.6 at a minimum. Although Oracle JDK 1.7 for Mac OS X is incompatible with JBoss Developer Studio 5, all of the other distributions of Oracle JDK 1.7 are compatible.

important.para: As JBoss Developer Studio is based on Eclipse, the system requirements of Eclipse 3.7.2 are also applicable to JBoss Developer Studio 5.0.2. For example, GTK is required as the windowing system on Linux distributions, Win32 on Microsoft Windows operating systems and Cocoa on Mac OS X operating systems. Further information about Eclipse 3.7.2 system requirements can be viewed at http://www.eclipse.org/eclipse/development/readme_eclipse_3.7.2.html.
